thread.section_title: Upad - The UK's largest online letting agent Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Upad - The UK's largest online letting agent | upad.co.uk
thread.title: Lucy
thread.title_full: Upad - The UK's largest online letting agent reviewed by Lucy

author: Lucy
title: Lucy
text:
I have had a great experience with Upad throughout the rental of my apartment. Upad were recommended to us due to the great service and reasonable pricing strategy and they didn't disappoint.
This is the first time I have rented our apartment and Chirag (our assigned Account Manager) talked me through every step and was always available when assistance was required. I cannot recommend them enough and will definitely use them in the future.
